message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $15,000.  What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
I'm still interested in the product, but $13,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $11,000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
